input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product specifications and product specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product specification:
Walther Waffen PPK P22 Pistole firearms cotton patches Logo Vest Jacket Hat Hoodie Backpack Iron On patches

Product specifications:
High quality embroidered iron sew on cotton patches
Headbonding glue surface on the back side for ironing on cotton material
Only iron on cotton without steam function. Leather or synthetic fabric must be stitched on.
Strong, bright colours! High quality embroidery! Perfectly chained!
Buy with confidence! 100% customer satisfaction guaranteed!
Ships from Thailand. Free shipping.
input_text.Response A: High quality embroidered iron sew on cotton patches! Perfect for uniforms, costumes, jackets, jeans, backpacks, hats and other accessories.  The patch has a heat activated glue backing so it can be ironed on. Please be aware that you need a heat press to apply this properly if you use an iron at home please be sure to use the steam function and to press the patch for at least 20 seconds.  Leather or synthetic fabric must be stitched on.respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
